verbs.description: As [ARG0: the Russia investigation and the Stormy Daniels scandal] [V: threaten] [ARG1: to bring him down] , President Donald Trump is using all kinds of distractions to change the conversation , so he recycled the bogus " war on Christmas " during a National Day of Prayer event at the White House on Thursday .
